welcome_message_body: Welcome to Temixco, a charming city known for its beautiful natural landscapes, vibrant culture, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay.

restaurants.name: Las Brasas
restaurants.description: Las Brasas is a taco restaurant located in Emiliano Zapata.

restaurants.name: Santo Coyote
restaurants.description: Santo Coyote is a mexican restaurant located in Jalisco.
restaurants.address: Calle Lerdo de Tejada 2379, Americana, 44150 (Entre Francisco Javier G. y Lerdo de tejada), 44150 Jalisco, Guadalajara

restaurants.name: Taqueria Los Misshoos
restaurants.description: Taqueria Los Misshoos is a taco restaurant located in Jiutepec.

restaurants.name: Tacos "La Fiesta"
restaurants.description: Tacos "La Fiesta" is a taco restaurant located in Jiutepec.

restaurants.name: Café Colibrí
restaurants.description: Café Colibrí is a breakfast spot located in Jiutepec.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at General Mariano Matamoros Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at General Mariano Matamoros Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
